document.full_text: andy roddick launched his title bid at the indian wells atp tournament with an imposing 6-3 7-5 victory over fellow american james blake in the second round sunday.
document.title: roddick powers into third round, berdych also through
lines_and_colors: andy roddick launched his title bid at the indian wells atp tournament with an imposing 6-3 7-5 victory over fellow american james blake in the second round sunday.
